name: Smith Pit
description:
Smith Pit is a fast-paced blacksmith simulator set in the dark alleys of the town. Your job this time: Scavenge gear from defeated adventurers, repair and sell for profit. The catch: Your smithy is attached to your Rival's! Fight, sabotage and steal your way to top $!

  • Scavenge gear from defeated adventurers
  • Repair it for maximum profit
  • Steal from your rival's display tables
  • Sabotage their wares
  • Defend your own!
